title: baiters/advance_fee/sources/scamorama/noogie_white_krob.html
notes: In our last thrilling episode, William White and his evil boss Kevin Krob (two scammers whose real names are probably quite  different, note the name attached to their bank account) had threatened to kill our hero, Lewis D. "Lewd" Noogie. Lewd then tried to hire them to kill his administrative assistant Maya Bushburn and his massage therapist Olga. As we rejoin Lads of our Lives, William White tries to extort money from Maya to get out of her contract with death.

"Ascon Assasins Assasins" <asconassasins_deathdealers009@yahoo.co.uk>
 
hello Mr Lewis Noogie,
Yes it is true Mr Tony told me that you are interested in having a deal with me i am quite sure that Mr Tony must have told you all about me, it is quite deficult to let you know that i have been in this business for a very long time.
 
But i think is better i explain to you further more about me and my job, now i know that you are interested in getting rid of two FBI agent in United Kingdom. I am also sure that you know that getting rid of these Fbi agent will be a beat deficult task, but i will do it because it is my job and i have been trained for it i am letting you know about this because it going to cost you alot so if you are ready to pay the fee i am assuring you a %100 that i will do the job sucessfully without any tress.
 
So Mr Lewis Noogie, getting rid of this two FBI agent will cost you $30,000 for the job, And you are to pay $15,000 before the job will be carried out and the balance of $15,000 after the job has been done sucessfully.

My teams and conditions are as follow:
 
1: The said payment of $15,000 must be made before i carry out this operation.
2: If i fail to carry out this job i will kindly return back the said amount that was paid by you.
3: Also note that the balance of $15,000 must be made as soon as i finish the job.
 
I am sure that you have read and understand all my Terms and Conditions so if you have agree and accept to pay the demanded fees that i have requested for, so that i can carry out this operation get back to me with a positive response.
 
Your Immedaite respond is needed because i have other job to do.. I promise and assure you that you will definately call me for another deal by the time i am through with the deal that i am about to do for you now.
 
Sign:
Mr Lake Cloe.
Ascom Assassins.
The Lads are still trying to frighten Lewd Noogie. Kevin Krob is out of his imaginary jail, and a new "FBI" agent, Ken West, tries to put the hurt on Lewd.

messages.body:
, who has graced these pages many times, receives The Contract Killer letter.

The action to date:

How convenient! Lewd actually needs the services of a contract killer. He wants his ex-wife and his massage therapist bumped off and talks the "killer" into taking on this new job instead.
Growing impatient, the Lads bring on phony FBI agent "Mark Johan" who threatens Lewd with prison. 
"Contract killer" Kevin kills "Mark Johan's" (imaginary) wife and son.
"Mark Johan" has "Kevin" arrested. 
Then new "FBI agent" Tony Love, promises to get Lewd's case dropped if he pays up.
Lewd asks "Tony" to have "Mark" knocked off.
"Tony" tells Lewd to contact "Lake Cloe" of "Ascom Assassins".
"Tony" then demands Lewd pay to avoid arrest for conspiring to kill "Mark".
"Lake Cloe" quotes Lewd a price to make his troubles go away - "Mark", "Agent Edwards", and the duplicitous "Tony".
Then things get complicated.


The Scammers:
 - Hired Killer, Leader of the Hit Team (williamwhite_west2007@yahoo.com)
 - The Hired Killer's Boss
 


 Joined by:
 - "Department of the FBI" (yeah right) (fbi_investigationscriminalsfight@yahoo.co.uk)

from  (how strange, he sits next to mob boss Kevin Krob)

 - fellow corrupt FBI associate to Mark Johan
 - head of "Ascom Assassins"
 and by mention only, the mysterious  Agent Edwards
 - yet another "FBI agent"

Lewd & Co.
 - Innocent International Hotel Consultant
 - Lewd's Administrative Assistant, who bears a striking resemblance to Carmen Electra
 - East German massage  therapist with a taste for handcuffs
messages.raw:
The flip-off! this time we mean it (we think)! april 23, 2008

Lewis D. "Lewd" Noogie, who has graced these pages many times, receives The Contract Killer letter.

This is the fourth or fifth random death threat that I've received. I always respond to them but the lad on the other end usually gets his email address shut down before I can get the thing off the ground. I think these guys are here for the duration.

The action to date:

How convenient! Lewd actually needs the services of a contract killer. He wants his ex-wife and his massage therapist bumped off and talks the "killer" into taking on this new job instead.
Growing impatient, the Lads bring on phony FBI agent "Mark Johan" who threatens Lewd with prison.
"Contract killer" Kevin kills "Mark Johan's" (imaginary) wife and son.
"Mark Johan" has "Kevin" arrested. [They apparently sit next to each other in the cyber cafe, see below. They might even be the same person on different days. Picture the perp walk.]
Then new "FBI agent" Tony Love, promises to get Lewd's case dropped if he pays up.
Lewd asks "Tony" to have "Mark" knocked off.
"Tony" tells Lewd to contact "Lake Cloe" of "Ascom Assassins".
"Tony" then demands Lewd pay to avoid arrest for conspiring to kill "Mark".
"Lake Cloe" quotes Lewd a price to make his troubles go away - "Mark", "Agent Edwards", and the duplicitous "Tony".
Then things get complicated.

The Scammers:
William White - Hired Killer, Leader of the Hit Team (williamwhite_west2007@yahoo.com)
Kevin Krob - The Hired Killer's Boss [does his banking under the name of MR O. EMAKPOR at HALIFAX PLC]
William White: Received: from [64.214.231.141] --
Kevin Krob: Received: from [64.214.231.140]
I'm guessing the two are not far apart.
[Global Crossing [an international ISP - this - or at least the nearest router - possibly in Saudi Arabia, near Shaqra.]
Joined by:
Mark Johan - "Department of the FBI" (yeah right) (fbi_investigationscriminalsfight@yahoo.co.uk)
from [64.214.231.140] (how strange, he sits next to mob boss Kevin Krob)
Tony Love - fellow corrupt FBI associate to Mark Johan
Mr Lake Cloe - head of "Ascom Assassins"
and by mention only, the mysterious Agent Edwards
Ken West - yet another "FBI agent"

Lewd & Co.
Lewis D. "Lewd" Noogie - Innocent International Hotel Consultant
Maya Bushburn - Lewd's Administrative Assistant, who bears a striking resemblance to Carmen Electra
Olga - East German massage therapist with a taste for handcuffs

messages.body:
Mr. Krob,
 
We have a little problem.
 
As your boys have undoubtedly told you, the hotel where I work is in Gadyukina, Russia. Gadyukina is a small village and there is nothing remotely resembling a Western Union here. Ask them, they will verify this. Most of the financial transactions I make are wire transfers from my computer.
 
The nearest city that has a Western Union is Irkutsk, which is 8 hours away by car. The roads are pretty well snowed in and it will be impossible to get there until we have a warming spell. The only way I can think of to get your money to you would be for you to give me an account number where I could wire the money. Or I could meet with one of your boys and pay him the money.
 
Mr. Krob, I really don't want any trouble but you're putting me in an impossible positiion. This morning I was able to raise another $2,000 so I now have a total of $5,000. I will await your further instructions.
 
Lewd

messages.body:
Mr. Krob,
 
I'm starting to feel a little easier about all of this, now that you and I are partners and you are beginning to sound more reasonable. You and I might even end up as friends over this.
I see two ways we can do this - either your boys can take care of Olga now or they can go do their other job and circle back for Olga later. Which way works best for you guys?
 
You're probably wondering how I got myself into this mess, right? Well, I guess you deserve to know. Olga and I had kind of a 'thing' for awhile but I couldn't afford her eating habit. This chick can eat like a horse, she likes expensive restaurants and I was running out of cash to feed her. I started cooling things down a bit right about the time I hired Maya, my admin assistant. Now this babe is smokin' hot, kinda looks like Carmen Electra. Anyhow, Olga saw me putting the old Noogie moves on Maya and ran off very upset. The part that Olga missed was where Maya slapped me and told me never to touch her again. A few days later I tried kissing up to Olga to reconcile but she pulled a knife on me, told me that if I ever got within 5 feet of her she'd neuter me and said me my days were numbered. I figure that's about the time she called you guys.
 
Anyhow, let me know how you want to handle this.
 
Lewd

Thanks so very much for the account information, it will make it so much easier to pay for your work once the job is finished.
 
Let me ask you somethng. If I wanted to have BOTH Olga and my admin assistant bumped off, would it cost me more? Do you have any two-for-one specials going on these days? The reason I ask is that Maya has started carrying a knife, too. Big sucker, looks like something Jim Bowie would use to kill bears, and she smiles at me and runs her finger along the blade every time I walk into her office. I'm starting to think that maybe she and Olga both were behind hiring you guys.
 
After you have taken care of the two of them, I can deposit the $2,000 I have now and I think I can come up with the rest in a couple of months. I'll be sure and scan the information and send it to you once I make the deposit.

Sometimes I get carried away and turn the old Noogie charm on too strong. Devestates 'em when I sneak out of town.

messages.body:
Kevin,
 
How are you today, my friend? I hope this finds you well and happy because I have good news.
 
And I have bad news.
 
The good news is that Olga, Maya and I have made up. Yes, it turns out that our situation was really over nothing. Olga was upset and sulking over my refusal to allow her to celebrate Hitler's birthday with a hotel lawn party. Last night I gave in and told her she could go ahead with it as long as she doesn't let it get too rowdy and that she and the guests all promise to leave Poland alone after it's over. I know, you're saying to yourself, "All of this over a lawn party?", but that's what it was all about. Silly, no?
 
The bad news is that I stopped the wire transfer of the $5,000 to your nominated account. Since we don't need you anymore you can go ahead and send your boys off to their next assignment. You might want to expedite that move because Olga says she's looking for yours and their ugly asses. I don't know which one of her buttons you pushed but I wouldn't want to be in your shoes if she finds you.
 
It's been great working with you, my friend. If I ever decide that I need someone snuffed, you've got first dibs on the job. I feel kinda bad that I never had a chance to meet any of your boys and buy them a beer but if you're ever in this area yourself, by all means look me up.
 
Ciao.
 
Your pal,
Lewd

messages.body:
Kevin, old boy, so good to hear from you.
 
Yeah, I got some bad news yesterday. The Feds busted a couple of your boys and they're looking for your ugly ass as we speak. If I were you I think I'd lay low for awhile, these guys don't fool around. They even sent me a picture of one of your boys that they had trussed up like a Christmas turkey.
 
On the other hand, if you still insist on coming, you'd make Olga, the East German massage therapist, the happiest woman on the planet. Every time your name gets mentioned she gets this wierd little smile on her face and then punches a hole in one of the walls. I've got a drywall crew working around the clock repairing the damage. She really, REALLY wants to meet you in person.
 
Kevin, take some advice - you need to get into a different line of work. Every one of your 3 targets, me included, is still walking around. That tells me you ain't much of a hitman. And your boys are laughable. I can't imagine what they were doing the entire time they were here except for freezing their butts off.
 
Well, I gotta get back to work. I'm taking Olga to the blini restaurant tonight and I've got stuff I have to finish first.
 
Oh, by the way, I'll be sending your latest email to the FBI tonight.
 
Talk to you later.
Lewd

Department of Justice/Federal Bureau of Investigation

February 15, 2008
 
Hello Mr Lewis D. Noogie,

We are very delited to receive a quick response from you and we must say we are gradually working according to our investigation here in our office and we are also promising you that very soon Mr Kevin Krob will be arrested and charge to court for threat, We will also like to tell you know that we will like you to send us your tele phone number so that we can call you and discuse it with you, Please if you recieve any mail from Mr Kevin dont hesitate to contact us.

Our Mission is to protect and defend the United Kingdom against terrorist and foreign intelligence threats, to uphold and enforce the criminal laws of the United Kingdom , and to provide leadership and criminal justice services to the public, state, municipal, and international agencies and partners.



Our Priority is to execute the following priorities, we will produce and use intelligence to protect the nation from threats and to bring to justice those who violate the law.
Our mission is to help protect you, your communities, and your businesses from the most dangerous threats facing our nationÑfrom international and domestic terrorists to spies on U.S. soilÉfrom cyber villains to corrupt government officialsÉfrom mobsters to violent gangsÉfrom child predators to serial killers. Learn more here about our work with law enforcement and intelligence partners across the country and around the globe.
The very heart of FBI operations lies in our investigationsÑwhich serve, as our mission states, "to protect and defend the United Kingdom against terrorist and foreign intelligence threats and to enforce the criminal laws of the United Kingdom Our Priorities." We currently have jurisdiction over violations of more than 200 categories of federal law, and you can find the major ones below, grouped within our three national security priorities and our five criminal priorities. Also visit our Intelligence program site, which underpins and informs all our investigative programs.

THANKS ONCE AGAIN.
YOUR REGARDS MR JOHAN.

messages.subject: GREETINGS TO YOU FROM THE FBI OFFICE
messages.body:
Hello Mr Lewis,
 
Ask top officials at the Federal Bureau of Investigation what most worries the nation's premier law-enforcement agency, and they are likely to admit that the public enemies these days include not only drugs, corruption and organized crime, but also threats in the country, how every your reply has also help us in our investigations here in our office and we are really appreciative about your kind afford in this matter.
 
Ask top officials at the Federal Bureau of Investigation what most worries the nation's premier law-enforcement agency, and they are likely to admit that the public enemies these days include not only drugs, corruption and organized crime, and threats.
 
Few issues have proved more vexing for mr William the bureau's director. In recent months, his aides say, he has grown more concerned about the rising chorus from civil rights leaders accusing the bureau of singling out black officials for investigation, harassment and prosecution.
As a result, law-enforcement officials say, Mr. williams will be charge to court as soon as possible, including face-to-face meetings with his critics. The steps are intended to dispel what the bureau acknowledges to be a serious problem, but one more thing before all this can come to pass you will have to reply mr kevin asking him to give you an account that you want to pay after that get back to us so that we can tell you what to do next.

Among the most outspoken critics is Benjamin L. Hooks, the executive director of the National Association for the Advancement of Colored People. ''It is not enough to mouth pious platitudes about law and order if laws apply only to the black and the poor,'' he said. ''We insist that black leaders be treated like all others when they stand before the bar of justice.''
 
Complaints have also come from black members of Congress. Representative that Mr williams also killed a man called John bills Last Month In Spain Judiciary Committee, has said he plans to hold Mr kevin will be very easy if you comply with the FBI black officials. Representative Mervyn M. Dymally, a California Democrat, has called for the formation of an organization to raise money and also said that if you can help us to catch Mr kevin you will be awarded with the sum of ($700,000)
The concern over harassment charges appeared to intensify at the F.B.I. after the criticism of its actions in the case of Mayor Marion S. Barry Jr. of Washington. Law-enforcement officials who had said their case was solid were stung when the jury fine Mr. Kevin only of a single misdemeanor and could not reach a verdict on 12 other counts, including 3 felonies.
 
Some officials said the jurors rejected the bureau's method of arrest, in which a former lover of mr kevin lives in UK too and we have send a men to get her , where he was videotaped smoking crack. Such tactics backfired, the officials said, because they reinforced the perception that the Government would resort to anything, even entrapment, in its obsession to prosecute Mr. kevin.
 
ONCE AGAIN THANKS FOR YOUR RESPONSE.

YOURS REGARDS

messages.body:
Mr. Johan,
 
Kevin told me about your wife.
 
My bad.
 
Here I am again for the second time in three days, asking you to try to forgive Kevin's latest shenanigans. I know you're probably not in a very good mood right now but it's at times like this when we need to try to look on the bright side - now you can start looking for a brand new wife. messages.body:
Mr. Johan,
 
You are putting me in a difficult position. I think by now you know that everyone concerned is sorry about your wife and kid. It was all just a big mistake and it wasn't really my fault - I told Kevin not to go around killing people but by now you know how thick-skulled he is. I am an innocent man and there should not even be a file on me in your office.
 
I'm willing to work something out with you, financially speaking. The problem is that, even if I satisfy you, I've still got Kevin the Barbarian storming around out there and threatening to come here to Gadyukina to kill me, Maya, Olga and probably the rest of the village.
 
Most of all, I don't want you to to forward my file to the criminal department. Me having to spend the next 20 years in Shawshank is going to make it difficult maintaining my hotel consulting business. I'm willing to pay you the $20,000 in compensation for Kevin's little blunders, but you have to catch him first. When you can prove to me that his ass is safely behind bars, the $20,000 will be in your account the next day.
 
My plan is that I will arrange a meeting in London with Kevin to pay him off. I'll let you know the location of the meeting and when he arrives, you and your partner swoop in and grab him. And during the capture, if you or your partner's gun were to accidentally discharge and Kevin were to be shredded in an accidental fusilade, no harm done. You can always say your gun has a hair trigger and when you dropped it it went off 14 times.
 
I see this as the only fair solution. You take care of Kevin and I'll take care of you.
 
Deal?

Mr. Johan,

Once again, I'm sorry about the family thing but you're probably pretty well over that by now. My suggestion is to jump back into the dating scene, start meeting new people, maybe take up something like tennis. You'll be a new man in no time.
 
Don't believe anything that Kevin says about me being involved with all the killing that was going on. You can believe that I chewed his ass good for that. Lewd

messages.body:
Have a nice day?!? Have a nice day?!? You tell me I'm going to have to spend the rest of my life in jail and then you say, 'have a nice day'??? You FBI guys have a sick sense of humor.
 
I don't understand why you choose to take Kevin's word over mine. Haven't I always been up front with you? Didn't we work as a team to capture him? Thanks to me you were able to catch the greatest assassin ever known. Thanks to me your career is going to skyrocket. Thanks to me they'll probably give you a parade for catching this guy.
 
I have a counter-offer. Instead of giving you $20,000, I'll give you and your partner two weeks free here at the hotel in Gadyukina, everything included. This is a party hotel situated in a party village and I promise you will have the time of your life here. Remember I told you about Olga's younger sister Oxnard? She's yours for the time you're here.
 
Just let me know when you can get here and I'll arrange everything.
 
I'm looking forward to meeting you in person.
 
Lewd

Lewd

messages.body:
Mr. Cloe,
 
You come highly recommended by Mr. Tony and he assures me that you can handle the job. However, your asking price of $30,000 seems a bit steep for this job. I'm not asking you to take out J. Edgar Hoover, just a couple of ordinary agents.
 
I admit that my experience with hired killers is limited to one Mr. Kevin Krob. I don't know if you've ever heard of him but he and his boys were useless. Someone told me he was the greatest assassin ever known but he was more like the biggest a**hole ever known. You can see why I might be a bit hesitant to employ someone else of your profession.
 
I feel that a more fair arrangement would be for you to take care of one of the agents as a display of your capabilities before payment. I will then pay you what is a reasonable amount and then you take care of the second one. When the job is complete, I pay you the remainder and we forget we ever knew each other.
 
I'm sure we can settle on a fair and reasonable price. I also need instructions on how to get the money to you.
 
Lake, if I may use your first name, it is important to me that we get this done quickly. I want to return to my normal quiet, sedate life that I had before Krob and his band of hooligans showed up. Please move quickly on this.
 
By the way, my friends call me Lewd (short for Lewis D.)
 
Lewd

messages.body:
Lake,
 
Listen, I just wanted to say how much I appreciate everything you've done for me; you've been a real pal and I can't tell you what a relief it is to finally have the FBI off my ass. Now I can go back to my life.
 
First thing, though, is to take a well-earned and much-needed vacation. Olga, the East German massage therapist is flying back from the UK tonight and I'm going to meet her in Irkutsk and spend a few days there. I feel like a tremendous weight has been lifted from my shoulders and I'm gonna celebrate.
 
Thanks again for everything and if you're ever in Gadyukina be sure to look me up.
 
Your pal,
Lewd

Lake,
 
I know I still owe you your money but I gotta ask a favor. You see, Olga, the East German massage therapist who works at the hotel just returned from the UK last night and I'm with her now here in Irkutsk. I'm trying to get back in with her but to do that I gotta show her a good time, you dig? She has kinda expensive tastes and feeding her has cost me a bundle just in the short time we've been here. I had to stop the transfer of the money to your nominated account but, I promise, it's only for a short time. Once I get back to Gadyukina I'll see if I can't dig up some more to send you.
 
We're both men, right? We understand how sometimes we have to cut each other some slack in business, especially when business is interfering with matters of the heart.
 
I appreciate your help on this and I'll return the favor some day. Oh, and nice work on taking care of Edwards and Tony. It's so nice not having to worry about those guys any more.
Wish me luck with Olga and I'll talk to you later.
 
Lewd

messages.subject: Big Favor To Ask
messages.body:
Lake,
 
Dude, I hate to trouble you but I gotta ask you another favor. I just don't know who else to turn to.
 
Olga wants to stay here in Irkutsk over the weekend but I'm running out of money. This chick just won't stop eating and she's not satified with going to some noodle joint; she wants the expensive places.
 
Any chance you could wire a couple thousand dollars to the Western Union office here? I promise I'll pay you back as soon as I get back to Gadyukina. I'd really appreciate it and I would owe you one, big time. If you don't mind doing it, just send me the control number and if you are asked to provide a test question and answer, use the following:
 
Test Question - Who is absolutely the dumbest mugu to stick his butt-ugly head out from under a rock in all the years I've been dicking with scammers?
 
Test Answer - Lake Cloe
 
Thanks. I really appreciate it, dog.
 
Your pal,
Lewd

Lake, you were supposed to make my problem with the FBI go away. You didn't do that. As a matter of fact, I suspect that things are even worse now, because it seems that the entire FBI organization knows about me. And for this you expect to get paid? Puhleeze. Your bumbling efforts are beginning to make that guy Kevin Krob look like the consumate professional, and he was an idiot. I'd be half tempted to hire him to fix your ass if I didn't think he'd wipe out half of London while doing it.
 
I received a substantial sum of money three days ago as a bonus for my work here and it was my intention to pay you off this week. That is, until I found out that you did a half-assed job. You want to get paid?? Then FINISH THE JOB! Get rid of this guy Ken West and do it quickly. And by the way, they turned Kevin Krob loose and he said he's coming here to kill me. Find him and put him out of his misery.
 
This entire situation has become a circus because you didn't do your job right the first time. Fix it so I can go back to a normal life and THEN I'll pay you.
 
Lewd

messages.body:
Mr. West,
 
I must still insist that you have made a terrible mistake. I vaguely recall a brief correspondence with a Mr. Johan, but it was only in regards to a vacation he was planning to take here in Gadyukina with his family. The correspondence ceased when his family met with some sort of ghastly accident. Automobile, I think.
 
I would also mention that the name Noogie is very common in this part of the world, as is the given name Lewis. There are probably dozens, if not hundreds, of Lewis Noogies here in Russia and Eastern Europe.
 
I'm sure that you can now see that you have made an error in suspecting me in any kind of foul play with one of your agents. I am an upstanding, law-abiding citizen and wish no one harm.
 
Sincerely,
Lewis D. Noogie

messages.body:
Mr. West,
 
I assumed by now you would have discovered your mistake but I see that this has not happened. I tell you I am innocent of all these accusations. I cannot be responsible for all these heinous crimes you accuse me of, I haven't even left this hotel in the past six months.
And how can you say that I'm going to prison when I haven't even been tried for these crimes? Whatever happened to innocent until proven guilty?
 
I think I should come to London to discuss this with you in person. Why don't we set up a meeting someplace quiet and isolated where we can solve this. I can be in London in 3 days.
 
Lewis

messages.body:
Mr. West,
 
My life has been a circus since that man Kevin Krob showed up and I can't take it anymore. I am tired of running and it is time for me to stop. I am ready to give up.
 
I confess that I hired Kevin Krob to get rid of my admin assistant Maya Bushburn and Olga, the East German massage therapist. I confess that I hired Lake Cloe to get rid of agents Mark Johan, his partner Edwards, and Tony Love. I also confess that I hired Lake Cloe to get rid of you. Sorry about that, it was very rude of me.
 
I did not, however, have anything to do with Kevin Krob killing agent Johan's family. When I hired him to get rid of Agent Johan I wasn't counting on the St. Valentines Day Massacre.
 
So there you have it. I'm guilty and I'm ready to give up. I will be waiting here for your men to arrive to arrest me. Olga has offered to keep me handcuffed until you get here but so far I have declined. Olga very much enjoys using handcuffs on me and it's not always a pleasant experience.
 
I await your arrival.
Lewd



 




scamorama main street 
* 
get booked 
*
messages.raw:
Lewd Noogie to: Ken West
Mr. West,

My life has been a circus since that man Kevin Krob showed up and I can't take it anymore. I am tired of running and it is time for me to stop. I am ready to give up.

I confess that I hired Kevin Krob to get rid of my admin assistant Maya Bushburn and Olga, the East German massage therapist. I confess that I hired Lake Cloe to get rid of agents Mark Johan, his partner Edwards, and Tony Love. I also confess that I hired Lake Cloe to get rid of you. Sorry about that, it was very rude of me.

I did not, however, have anything to do with Kevin Krob killing agent Johan's family. When I hired him to get rid of Agent Johan I wasn't counting on the St. Valentines Day Massacre.

So there you have it. I'm guilty and I'm ready to give up. I will be waiting here for your men to arrive to arrest me. Olga has offered to keep me handcuffed until you get here but so far I have declined. Olga very much enjoys using handcuffs on me and it's not always a pleasant experience.

I await your arrival.
Lewd

[No word from anybody for over a week now, I think this truly is the end this time. However, I still have a pair of unpaid, pissed-off assassins out there running loose and the FBI has not yet arrived here in Gadyukina to arrest me for my crimes, so who knows. I do hope that agent West and his team arrive soon - Olga's handcuffs are getting damned uncomfortable.]
